name: Gary's Adventure(Demo)
description:
Gary's Adventure is a 2D platformer about a cheerful cube who lives on the beautiful planet called Sqauria. But the evil Cuadidios come to Sqauria to conquer Gary's home! Now it's up to him to save his people and his world! The full game will have 32 levels spread across 8 worlds. Comments on how this game could be improved are very welcomed. 



Credits

Programming - Chief Reddog

Music - Chief Reddog

Level Design - Chief Reddog

Art - Chief Reddog
